content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from you to browse a website for scavenger hunt ideas for kids. The website was Good Housekeeping and the question was "What are some fun scavenger hunt ideas for kids?" I successfully opened the website and found a list of ideas. You then instructed me to write the URL of the website to a file named "scavenger_hunt_links.txt". This task was also completed successfully.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of 20 creative scavenger hunt ideas for kids, including indoor, outdoor, nature, art, reading, and shape-themed hunts. The scavenger hunts can be adapted to different situations and interests and can be tailored to the skill level of the children. The article suggests starting with the location and figuring out appropriate themes, such as colors or seasonal items. The scavenger hunts can be used as a fun and educational activity for toddlers or tweens. \n \n Links: ['Search (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/search/)', ' (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/life/parenting/g32050844/scavenger-hunt-ideas-for-kids/)', 'Subscribe (https://shop.goodhousekeeping.com/good-housekeeping-all-access-membership.html?source=panelnav&cds_tracking_code=panelnav)', 'My Articles (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/my-stuff/)', 'GH+ Member Portal (https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/life/a32304894/gh-plus-member-portal/)']"}]
"""
